title: Python as an Engineering Tool
text:
Etherpad

We use the etherpad to take communal notes during the course.
The link to the etherpad is on our Canvas home page.

title: Python as an Engineering Tool
text:
Asking questions and getting help

If you have general questions about a topic, please raise your hand to ask it.
For more specific questions about issues you are having individually, please use the sticky notes to indicate whether you are on track or need help.

title: Python as an Engineering Tool
text:
What will this course cover?

Python basics
Python for plotting
Python for data analysis
Time series analysis
Building dashboards
Python for machine learning

title: Python as an Engineering Tool
text:
Project

3-person teams (self sign up on the etherpad)

Your team will

choose your own topic (that showcases what you learned)
work on your project on Thursday afternoon.
make a 15-min presentation on Friday morning.
submit your code on Canvas by Friday noon.
